# showEditor(for:)

**Instance Method**

Invokes the built-in photo editor for the given asset.

## Declaration

```swift
func showEditor(for asset: PHAsset)
```

## Parameters

- **asset**: The asset to edit.

## Discussion

To be notified when assets are edited, the extension should observe library changes by implementing the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHPhotoLibraryChangeObserver] protocol.

## Updating Assets

- **updatedProjectInfo(from:completion:)**: Creates an updated [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/PhotosUI/PHProjectInfo] instance from existing project information and current assets.
